DocAttribute.Name: CrossSectionPositions
DocAttribute.Documentation: List of distance expressions in sequentially increasing order paired with _CrossSections_, indicating the position of the corresponding section along the _Directrix_.

DocAttribute.Name: FixedAxisVertical
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indicates whether _Sections_ are oriented with the Y axis of each profile facing upwards in +Z direction (True), or vertically perpendicular to the _Directrix_ varying according to slope (False).

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrespondingSectionPositions
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The set of cross sections and the set of cross section positions shall be of the same size.

DocWhereRule.Name: NoLongitudinalOffsets
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Distance expressions must not use longitudinal offsets.
